name: No Man's Garden (Grow Jam)
description:
Prototype for the Grow Jam, in which we had to make a game revolving around gardening, growing or cultivation. My personal theme for this was "Everything can grow on trees".

In this game you can grab objects from any distance and plant them to have them grow on trees.

Growing a tree has a chance of creating new life, planting many of these creatures in the same soil will cause the resulting tree to hybridize them.

There is no end goal with this game, just see what kinds of wacky creatures you can create by planting trees!
